items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Just-Rite Positioning Spray temporarily suspends the hold of a tape or adhesive, which allows flexibility so that a hair system can be positioned precisely without affecting hold times.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Walker Tape®’s Just-Rite Positioning Spray temporarily suspends the hold of a tape or adhesive, which allows flexibility so that a hair system can be positioned precisely without affecting hold times. It’s great for new or experienced stylists to safeguard against slight mistakes during install. Skin safe and works on all systems.

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly.

With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
Close lid tightly.
Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
External use only, do not ingest.
Avoid eye contact.
Keep out of reach of children.
Test on a small area before use.
Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.displayname: Just-Rite Positioning Spray - 4 fl oz, Spray
items.storedisplayname2: Just-Rite Positioning Spray - 4 fl oz, Spray
items.storedescription:
After glue/tape has been applied to unit or scalp, spray Just-Rite Positioning Spray over the adhesive area. The amount sprayed will determine the amount of time available to adjust the unit (the more you spray, the longer you have until the adhesive grabs). Place the unit onto the scalp and move into place. Can also be used as a touch-up product.

We recommend performing a patch test before use.
items.pagetitle: Just-Rite Positioning Spray - 4 fl oz, Spray | Walker Tape
